===== Background =====

** Goals are broad; objectives are narrow.
** Goals are general intentions; objectives are precise.
** Goals are intangible; objectives are tangible. 
** Goals are abstract; objectives are concrete.
** Goals can't be validated as is; objectives can be validated.

==== Guiding Principal ====

The Ubuntu community will benefit from the efforts of the Artwork Team as it executes tasks and creates content.

==== Vision ====

The Artwork Team aims to enrich Ubuntu by designing high quality, original and beautiful themes to be available as an alternative to the
default look.
